participant_1.background:
My parents are very supportive of me, and they always encourage me to make healthy choices.
I learned that my best friend was lying to me about everything.
i have a cheap car my dad gave me.
I don't need to dress up to impress my husband because he loves me for who I am.
i started working at google last week on self driving car research.

participant_2.background:
I am so proud of myself for overcoming my fear of singing in front of people.
i only buy convertible cars.
I'm not in a band, but I like Bon Jovi and I've owned two Mustangs.
I love the sound of a classic car engine, it's like music to my ears.
I enjoy making things for my family.

content.text: Hey there, how are you doing today?
I'm pretty good, I got to overcome a big fear of mine this week!
I sang in front of a crowd for the first time.
That's awesome! I'm glad you were able to do that.
Thanks, it was really scary but it's also a big relief.
What kind of music do you like to sing?
I like classic rock mostly, like Bon Jovi and The Eagles.
Oh nice, I like those bands too!
My husband and I go to a lot of concerts together.
That sounds fun, I don't think I've been to a concert in a while.
You should go, it's a lot of fun to see your favorite bands live.
I'll have to look into it, I'm sure my husband would love to go too.
Awesome, I hope you have a great time!
